name: insert-unicode
description: Search for unicode characters and insert them into documents.

commands.title: Insert Exact Unicode as Hex Code

insert-unicode.page-size.title: Search Page Size
insert-unicode.page-size.description: The maximal number of items shown on one search page.

insert-unicode.unicode-font-use-regular-.title: Use Regular Space for Unicode Fonts
insert-unicode.unicode-font-use-regular-.description: Always use a normal space character instead of higher width spaces when using the 'insertFont' command. Some of the fonts use a different space character to account for larger character widths.

insert-unicode.disable-pre-filtering.title: Disable Pre-Filtering
insert-unicode.disable-pre-filtering.description: Disable the paged search and perform live filtering on the entire Unicode set. Can have performance issues.

insert-unicode.include-sequences.title: Include Sequences
insert-unicode.include-sequences.description: Include entries made up of a sequence of Unicode code points; some Emoji are defined this way.

insert-unicode.include-skin-tone-variant.title: Include Skin Tone Variants
insert-unicode.include-skin-tone-variant.description: Include skin tone variations of Emoji in the search. This adds five entries for every Emoji that supports skin tone modifiers. (Only has an impact if sequences are enabled; See: include-sequences)

insert-unicode.show-identified-character.title: Show Identified Characters in File
insert-unicode.show-identified-character.description: Relevant for the 'Identify Unicode Characters' command. If set to 'true', the results of the 'Identify Unicode Characters' command will always be displayed in a new file. When 'false', an info notification is shown which also offers the option to open the contents as file.
